original_title: Taking My Parents to Burning Man
overview: Bry, a reckless party animal, decides to rip his retired parents from their all-American lives and throw them into the adventure of a lifetime. As Bry and his folks enjoy the Dionysian side of life, they will all learn a bit about themselves & each other.
tagline: It's never too late to come of age again
title: Taking My Parents to Burning Man
